overview: Caroline is in an uncertain relationship with Henriette. The pair seem unsure of what exactly they want from each other: due to former, unexplored traumas, Caroline wants commitment, but also feels repulsed by getting close to anyone; while Henriette is “crazy” about her other half, but struggles to connect in ways that don’t involve small-talk about kids’ movies. And at the same time, Henriette’s ex-partner Elle remains part of her life, causing her current significant-other to start asking questions.
tagline: Let me slip into something more comfortable
title: Under My Skin
